word_mean: 睾丸炎：睾丸的炎症。本病的特点是疼痛肿胀和有沉重感，原因不明，但通常是由于淋病、梅毒、丝虫病或结核病所致

sentence.Network_en: Can orchitis use orchid tribute ( orchid liquid medicine ) go saliva fester part?
sentence.Network_cn: 睾丸炎可以用兰贡 ( 兰药水 ) 去吐沫化脓部分 么 ?

sentence.Network_en: Objective To investigate the diagnostic value of color Doppler flow imaging ( CDFI ) in acute orchitis and epididymitis.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的探讨彩色 多普勒 血流显像对急性附睾、睾丸炎的诊断价值.

sentence.Network_en: The association between mumps orchitis and testicular cancer is weak an incidence rate of 0.5 percent.
sentence.Network_cn: 腮腺炎性睾丸炎跟睾丸癌之间的关系很微弱,睾丸癌的发生率仅为0.5%.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 睾丸炎(orchitis)是睾丸感染后的急性炎性反应。一般继发于附睾炎，细菌经淋巴或输精管至附睾，然后扩散到睾丸引起附睾睾丸炎.

list.abs: acu te icteric infectious hepatitis急性睾丸炎 acute orchitis急性腰扭伤 acute lumbar sprain
有的患者在发生流行性腮腺炎时,会出现睾丸疼痛的症状。 流行性腮腺炎性睾丸炎(mumps orchitis)为约1/4的成人流行性腮腺炎可并发睾丸炎,而青春期前儿童患者合并.
结核穴 Node Point结核性睾丸炎 tuberculious orchitis结核性脑膜炎 tuberculous meningitis
肉芽肿性睾丸炎(granulomatous orchitis)比较少见,多发生于中年人。病因尚未阐明,患者常有睾丸损伤史,故可能为生殖细胞损伤后,产生或释放某种物质引起肉芽肿的形成,临床.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: modern Latin, from Greek orkhis 'testicle' + -itis

means.word_mean: 1. inflammation of one or both testes; characterized by pain and swelling

auth_sentence.content: Years ago, before the introduction of immunisation, infection with the mumps virus was a common cause of epididymo-orchitis.
